title: R. Nicholas Burns - Wikipedia
snippet: Robert Nicholas Burns (born January 28, 1956) is an American diplomat and international relations scholar. He served as the United States ambassador to China from 2022 to 2025. He is now Roy and Barbara Goodman Family Professor of the Practice of Diplomacy and International Relations at Harvard John F.

title: Biography: Amb. R. Nicholas Burns
snippet: R. Nicholas Burns is United States Ambassador to Greece. Appointed by President Clinton, he was sworn into office by Secretary of State Madeleine Albright on November 10, 1997. As Ambassador, he oversees all U.S. government programs at the U.S.
